sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SHUS, a large mass of ruins in the province of Khuzis- tan, in Persia, extending twelve miles from the Kerah to the Ahzal. They occupy an immense extent of ground, and are supposed, by Major Rennel and Colonel Kinneir, to be the ancient capital of Susa.
